lb-0d65.title: Evolved Spaceship Duel
lb-0d65.description: Rust program that evolves AI combatants for a 1v1 spaceship duel game with Asteroids-style mechanics and visualization

lb-1cx3.title: Match simulation system
lb-1cx3.description: Run matches between two genome-controlled ships, evaluate fitness based on hits, damage dealt, survival time, accuracy

lb-h630.title: Game physics engine: arena, ships, movement, projectiles
lb-h630.description: Implement 2D arena with toroidal wrapping, ship physics (rotation, thrust, inertia), projectile firing and movement, collision detection

lb-j2hn.title: Visualization: real-time Asteroids-aesthetic rendering
lb-j2hn.description: Render matches in real-time with line graphics on dark background. Show ships as triangles, projectiles as dots, arena boundaries. Display generation and fitness info

lb-o2on.title: Genome and neural network brain for ship AI
lb-o2on.description: Define genome structure encoding a simple neural network. Inputs: sensor data (opponent relative position, velocity, angle, distance). Outputs: thrust, rotate, fire

lb-tpwh.title: Integration: connect evolution loop with live visualization
lb-tpwh.description: Wire everything together: run evolution in background, display best-of-generation matches in the visualization window

lb-v9qu.title: Evolutionary system: population, selection, crossover, mutation
lb-v9qu.description: Manage population of genomes, run tournament selection, crossover and mutation operators, generational evolution loop

lb-vmfa.title: Improve evolution UX and combat quality
lb-vmfa.description: Address spec compliance gaps: non-blocking evolution so UI stays responsive during evolution, and improve combat quality

lb-w7d8.title: Non-blocking evolution: move computation to background thread
lb-w7d8.description: Currently pop.evaluate() runs 800 matches synchronously in the render loop, causing UI freezes. Move evolution to a background thread using std::thread and check for completion between showcase matches. This directly addresses the spec requirement: While evolution is running, the user must be able to watch matches being played out in real time.

lb-xa5t.title: Project setup: Cargo project with dependencies
lb-xa5t.description: Initialize Cargo project with macroquad for rendering, rand for RNG, and basic project structure

lb-yl5s.title: Enhance neural network inputs and fitness function
lb-yl5s.description: Add more sensor inputs (velocity direction, angular velocity, fire cooldown, projectile count) for richer decision-making. Improve fitness function to better reward aimed shots, dodging, and aggressive engagement.

lb-yqv8.title: Add ship-to-ship collision and speed limit
lb-yqv8.description: Ships currently pass through each other. Add elastic collision between ships. Also add a max speed cap to prevent unrealistic velocities.
